snippet: The Triple Crown champion American Pharoah had his first workout at Del Mar, Calif., in preparation for his next start in the Haskell Invitational in New Jersey.
abstract: Triple Crown winner American Pharoah is preparing for Haskell Invitational horse race, his first start since winning 2015 Belmont Stakes; other horse racing news noted.
lead_paragraph: The Triple Crown champion American Pharoah had his first workout at Del Mar, Calif., in preparation for his next start in the Haskell Invitational in New Jersey.
